sen.j: 西高瀬川（にしたかせがわ）は、京都府京都市を流れる淀川水系の一級河川。
sen.e: Nishitakase-gawa River is a class A river in the Yodo-gawa Water system running in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Nishitakase-gawa River is a class A river in the Yodo-gawa Water system running in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Nishitakase-gawa River is a class A river in the Yodo-gawa River system running in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 京都市右京区嵯峨天竜寺角倉町(渡月橋の東、数百メートル)の桂川から取水し、京都市伏見区下鳥羽上向島町で鴨川 (淀川水系)に注ぐ。
sen.e: Nishitakase-gawa River takes the water from Katsura-gawa River in Saga Tenryu-ji Suminokura-cho, Ukyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City (several hundred meters to the east of Togetsu-kyo Bridge) and flows to Kamo-gawa River (of the Yodo-gawa Water System) in Kamimukajiima-cho, Shimotoba, Fushimi-ku Ward, Kyoto City.

Nishitakase-gawa River takes the water from Katsura-gawa River in Saga Tenryu-ji Suminokura-cho, Ukyo-ku Ward, Kyoto City (several hundred meters to the east of Togetsu-kyo Bridge) and flows to Kamo-gawa River (of the Yodo-gawa Water System) in Kamimukajiima-cho, Shimotoba, Fushimi-ku Ward, Kyoto City.

The Nishitakase-gawa River takes the water from the Katsura-gawa River in Saga Tenryu-ji Suminokura-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City (several hundred meters to the east of Togetsu-kyo Bridge) and flows to the Kamo-gawa River (of the Yodo-gawa River system) in Kamimukaijima-cho, Shimotoba, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: Ukyo Ward, Fushimi Ward としました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: 流路は直線的で、直角に流れる方角を変える。
sen.e: It has a linear flow path and changes its flow directions by making right-angled turns.
It has a linear flow path and changes its flow directions by making right-angled turns.
It has a linear flow path and changes its flow directions by making right-angled turns.

sen.j: 分流後、途中で有栖川や天神川 (京都市)と交差する形で東に流れ、中京区壬生天池町で南に向きを変える。
sen.e: After diversion, Nishitakase-gawa River runs eastwards crisscrossing Arisu-gawa River and Tenjin-gawa River (Kyoto City) along the way and changes its direction to southwards in Mibu Amagaike-cho Nakagyou-ku Ward.

After being diverted, the Nishitakase-gawa River runs eastwards crisscrossing Arisu-gawa River and Tenjin-gawa River (Kyoto City) along the way and changes its direction southwards in Mibu Amagaike-cho Nakagyou-ku Ward.

After being diverted, the Nishitakase-gawa River runs eastwards crisscrossing the Arisu-gawa River and the Tenjin-gawa River (Kyoto City) along the way and changes its direction southwards in Mibu Amagaike-cho Nakagyo Ward.
sen.cmt: Nakagyo Wardとしました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: そのまま南に流れた後、中京区壬生高樋町で西に転じ、中京区壬生森前町でさらに南向きに流れる。
sen.e: After continuing to flow southwards, it turns west in Mibu Takahi-cho, Nakagyo-ku Ward and then runs southwards in Mibu Morimae-cho, Nakagyo-ku Ward.
After continuing to flow southwards, it turns west in Mibu Takahi-cho, Nakagyo-ku Ward and then runs southwards in Mibu Morimae-cho, Nakagyo-ku Ward.
After continuing to flow southwards, it turns west in Mibu Takahi-cho, Nakagyo Ward and then runs southwards in Mibu Morimae-cho, Nakagyo Ward.

sen.j: この後、下京区西七条西八反田町でまた西に向きを変え、下京区西七条八幡町で南に向く。
sen.e: The river, subsequently, changes its direction to the west again in Nishi-hattanda-cho, Nishi-shichijo, Shimogyo-ku Ward and then turns southwards in Nishi-shichijo Yawata-cho, Shimogyo-ku Ward.
The river, subsequently, changes its direction to the west again in Nishi-hattanda-cho, Nishi-shichijo, Shimogyo-ku Ward and then turns southwards in Nishi-shichijo Yawata-cho, Shimogyo-ku Ward.
The river, subsequently, changes its direction to the west again in Nishi-hattanda-cho, Nishi-shichijo, Shimogyo Ward and then turns southwards in Nishi-shichijo Yawata-cho, Shimogyo Ward.

sen.j: そして、南区 (京都市)吉祥院西ノ庄渕ノ西町、南東に転じ、JR西大路駅近辺を通り、吉祥院下水処理場でまた南に向きを変え、最後は伏見区下鳥羽上向島町で鴨川に合流する。
sen.e: It then turns southeast in Fuchinonishi-cho, Kisshoin, Minami-ku Ward, running in the neighborhood of JR Nishioji Station, turning again to southwards at Kisshoin sewage plant, and finally merging to Kamo-gawa River in Kamimukaijima-cho, Shimotoba, Fushimi-ku Ward.

It then turns southeast in Fuchinonishi-cho, Kisshoin, Minami-ku Ward, running in the neighborhood of JR Nishioji Station, turning again to southwards at Kisshoin sewage plant, and finally merging to Kamo-gawa River in Kamimukaijima-cho, Shimotoba, Fushimi-ku Ward.

It then turns southeast in Fuchinonishi-cho, Nishinosho, Kisshoin, Minami Ward, running in the neighborhood of JR Nishioji Station, turning again to southwards at Kisshoin sewage plant, and finally merging to the Kamo-gawa River in Kamimukaijima-cho, Shimotoba, Fushimi Ward.
sen.cmt: 住所を一部追加しました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: 桂川から天神川までの嵯峨 (京都市)や太秦では水量があるが、昭和10年（1935年）の京都大水害を機に、全てが天神川に注がれる形に改修されてしまっている。
sen.e: In Saga between Katura-gawa River and Tenjin-gawa River, Nishitakase-gawa River is swollen with water but after the Kyoto flood disaster in 1935, it was modified to empty the water into Tenjin-gawa River.

In Saga between Katura-gawa River and Tenjin-gawa River, Nishitakase-gawa River is swollen with water but after the Kyoto flood disaster in 1935, it was modified to empty the water into Tenjin-gawa River.

In Saga (Kyoto City) between the Katsura-gawa River and the Tenjin-gawa River, the Nishitakase-gawa River is swollen with water but after the Kyoto flood disaster in 1935, it was modified to empty the water into the Tenjin-gawa River.
sen.cmt: 京都市 を追加しました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: さらに、西大路三条付近で桂川と鴨川の分水嶺を越えることになる上、西大路三条以西は天神川に向かって（上流に向かって）流れるように改修されたこともあって、天神川～三条通の暗渠部あたりまで、溜まった雨水が流れる程度、もしくは干上がった状態になっている。
sen.e: Additionally, since Nishitakase-gawa River crosses over the divide between Katsura-gawa River and Kamo-gawa River and its flow path has been modified to run (upstream) towards Tenjin-gawa River from Nishioji-sanjo and the east, the water situation for the canal is that either accumulated rain water is running from Tenjin-gawa River to the vicinity of the drainage in Sanjo-dori Street or running dry.

Additionally, since Nishitakase-gawa River crosses over the divide between Katsura-gawa River and Kamo-gawa River and its flow path has been modified to run (upstream) towards Tenjin-gawa River from Nishioji-sanjo and the east. The the canal is either full of accumulated rain water running from Tenjin-gawa River to the vicinity of the drainage in Sanjo-dori Street or dry.

Additionally, since the Nishitakase-gawa River crosses over the divide between the Katsura-gawa River and the Kamo-gawa River and its flow path has been modified to run (upstream) towards the Tenjin-gawa River from Nishioji-sanjo and the east, the canal is either full of accumulated rain water or dry in the section from the Tenjin-gawa River to the vicinity of the drainage in Sanjo-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 文法を修正しました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: 西大路三条付近では水が流れることはまれである。
sen.e: There is rarely any water running in the canal in the vicinity of Nishioji-sanjo.
There is rarely any water running in the canal in the vicinity of Nishioji-sanjo.
There is rarely any water running in the canal in the vicinity of Nishioji-sanjo.

sen.j: 下京区の流域の一部では、堆積していた有害物質が雨水によって溶け出しても下流まで押し流すまでに至らず、さらに堆積していき、悪臭や水質汚濁の原因になっているところもある。
sen.e: In part of watersheds in Shimogyo-ku Ward, while rain water dissolves accumulated harmful substances, it is not sufficient enough to move those substances to the downstream, causing foul odors and water pollution in some areas.

In parts of the watershed section in Shimogyo-ku Ward, while rain water dissolves accumulated harmful substances, it is not sufficient enough to move those substances downstream, causing foul odors and water pollution in some areas.

In parts of the watershed section in Shimogyo Ward, while rain water dissolves accumulated harmful substances, it is not sufficient enough to move those substances downstream, causing foul odors and water pollution in some areas.

sen.j: なお、吉祥院から鴨川の合流までは吉祥院下水処理場で浄化処理された下水が流入するため、水量はある。
sen.e: However, since waste water treated at the Kisshoin sewage plant is discharged in to the canal, there is plenty of water between Kisshoin and the point where Nishitakase-gawa River and Kamo-gawa River meet.

However, since waste water treated at the Kisshoin sewage plant is discharged in to the canal, there is plenty of water between Kisshoin and the point where Nishitakase-gawa River and Kamo-gawa River meet.

However, since waste water treated at the Kisshoin sewage plant is discharged in to the canal, there is plenty of water between Kisshoin and the point where the Nishitakase-gawa River and the Kamo-gawa River meet.

sen.j: 平成14年（2002年）に国土交通省「第二期水環境改善緊急行動計画」の対象河川に選定され、水に親しむことのできる環境づくりや水質改善などの整備を進めている。
sen.e: In 2002, Nishitakase-gawa River was selected as a target river for 'The Second Urgent Action Strategy for Water Environment Improvement' by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism and progress is underway to develop environment to enjoy water and to improve water quality.
sen.cmt: 第二期水環境改善緊急行動計画 － 定訳不明
sen.e: In 2002, Nishitakase-gawa River was selected as a target river for 'The Second Urgent Action Strategy for Water Environment Improvement' by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism and progress is underway to develop environment to enjoy water and to improve water quality.

In 2002, Nishitakase-gawa River was selected as a target river for 'The Second Urgent Action Strategy for Water Environment Improvement' by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism and progress is underway to develop environment to enjoy water and to improve water quality.

sen.j: 江戸時代初期に角倉了以により大堰川が開削され、丹波国地方と京都の間の水運が確保された。
sen.e: In the early Edo Period, Oi-gawa River was excavated by Ryoi SUMINOKURA and thus the water transportation system between the Tanba Province region and Kyoto was secured.
In the early Edo Period, Oi-gawa River was excavated by Ryoi SUMINOKURA and thus the water transportation system between the Tanba Province region and Kyoto was secured.
In the early Edo period, the Oi-gawa River was excavated by Ryoi SUMINOKURA and thus the water transportation system between the Tanba Province region and Kyoto was secured.
sen.cmt: period を小文字にしました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: その大堰川によって運ばれた丹波地方の木材などを、京都側の終点である渡月橋上流から、市中心部に直接引き込むための運河として、文久3年（1863年）に嵯峨（渡月橋上流）～千本三条が開削された。
sen.e: In 1863, a channel between Saga (upstream from Togetsu-kyo Bridge) and Sembon-sanjo was excavated to build a canal to bring in lumber and the like carried down by Oi-gawa River directly from the upstream from Togetsu-kyo Bridge, the endpoint in Kyoto, to the city center.

In 1863, a channel between Saga (upstream from Togetsu-kyo Bridge) and Sembon-sanjo was excavated to build a canal to bring in lumber and the like carried down by Oi-gawa River from upstream from Togetsu-kyo Bridge, the endpoint in Kyoto, to the city center.

In 1863, a channel between Saga (upstream from Togetsu-kyo Bridge) and Senbon-sanjo was excavated to build a canal to bring in lumber of Tanba region and the like carried down by the Oi-gawa River from upstream from Togetsu-kyo Bridge, the endpoint in Kyoto, to the city center.
sen.cmt: 丹波地方の を追加しました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: のちの、明治3年（1870年）、当時の京都府が引き継ぐ形で伏見の鴨川まで開通させる。
sen.e: Later on, in 1870, then Kyoto Prefecture, taking over the project, connected the canal to Kamo-gawa River in Fushimi.
Later on, in 1870, Kyoto Prefecture, took over the project and connected the canal to Kamo-gawa River in Fushimi.
Later on, in 1870, Kyoto Prefecture took over the project and connected the canal to the Kamo-gawa River in Fushimi.
sen.cmt: カンマを削除しました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: 運河以外にも、京友禅などの染物の工場から出る排水を流すための下水路としての役割も担っており、川の色が日によってさまざまな色に変わったといわれている。
sen.e: In addition to functioning as a canal, Nishitakase-gawa River plays a role as a sewer system to discharge waste water from dye houses for various dye works such as Kyo-Yuzen and it is said that, depending on dye used, the color of the river varied from one day to the next.

In addition to functioning as a canal, Nishitakase-gawa River plays a role as a sewer system to discharge waste water from dye houses for various dye works such as Kyo-Yuzen and it is said that, depending on dye used, the color of the river varied from one day to the next.

In addition to functioning as a canal, Nishitakase-gawa River plays a role as a sewer system to discharge waste water from dye houses for various dye works such as Kyo-Yuzen and it is said that, depending on dye used, the color of the river varied from one day to the next.

sen.j: しかし、鉄道や道路などの陸運網が発達していくにつれ、利用価値が次第に薄れていき、運河としての機能を失っていった。
sen.e: As the land transportation network including railroads and roadways developed, Nishitakase-gawa River gradually lost its usefulness becoming dysfunctional as a canal.
As the land transportation network including railroads and roadways developed, Nishitakase-gawa River gradually lost its usefulness and function as a canal.
As the land transportation network including railroads and roadways developed, the Nishitakase-gawa River gradually lost its usefulness and function as a canal.
sen.cmt: the を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: また、たびたび水害が発生していたため、治水を目的に天神川を昭和10年（1935年）に開削。
sen.e: Additionally, since there were frequent flood damages, Tenjin-gawa River was excavated for the flood control purpose in 1935.
Additionally, since there were frequent flood damages, Tenjin-gawa River was excavated for flood control in 1935.
Additionally, since there were frequent flood damages, the Tenjin-gawa River was excavated for flood control in 1935.
sen.cmt: the を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: これにより、西高瀬川が分断されることになる。
sen.e: This excavation segmentized Nitakase-gawa River.
This excavation segmentized Nitakase-gawa River.
This excavation segmentized Nishitakase-gawa River.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 京都府
sen.e: Kyoto Prefecture
Kyoto Prefecture
Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 京都市右京区、中京区、下京区、南区 (京都市)、伏見区
sen.e: Ukyo-ku Ward, Nakagyo-ku Ward, Shimogyo-ku Ward, Minami-ku Ward and Fushimi-ku Ward, Kyoto City
Ukyo-ku Ward, Nakagyo-ku Ward, Shimogyo-ku Ward, Minami-ku Ward and Fushimi-ku Ward, Kyoto City

sen.cmt: xx ward という表現にしました。

tit.cmt: the を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: 小さい橋が多く掛けられており、特に太秦では住宅各戸に1本ずつ橋が掛けられている。
sen.e: There are numerous little bridges built over Nishitakase-gawa River and, particularly in Uzumasa, there is a bridge for every house.
There are numerous little bridges built over Nishitakase-gawa River and, particularly in Uzumasa, there is a bridge for every house.
There are numerous little bridges built over Nishitakase-gawa River and, particularly in Uzumasa, there is a bridge for every house.

sen.j: また、河川そのものが小さく、名前が不明な橋も多い。
sen.e: The river itself is so little that names of many of bridges are unknown.
The river itself is so small that the names of many of the bridges are unknown.
The river itself is so small that the names of many of the bridges are unknown.
